participant_1.background:
I enjoy hiking because it allows me to connect with nature and my spiritual side.
I hope my parents don't find out about my deployment.
I miss my grandchildren when they're not around, but I'm so happy to have them in my life.
i love my grandchildren.
i love robotics.

participant_2.background:
My future clients will love how I've combined my love of cleanliness and my talent for planning to create the best wedding days of their lives.
i am a chef.
I take care of my appearance.
I'm proud of the beautiful things I create with my hands.
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a bit of gardening, which helps to calm me down before I start my day.

content.text: I'm well, thank you! Just getting ready to hike in the woods.
That sounds really nice. I'm a bit jealous. I'm stuck at work.
Oh no! What do you do for work?
I'm a chef. I'm preparing for a wedding tomorrow.
Oh wow! That sounds really cool! I'm sure it will be a beautiful wedding.
Thanks! I hope so too. I put a lot of work into it.
I bet you did. It sounds like you're really good at your job.
Thanks. I like to think so.
What's your favorite part about being a chef?
I love being able to create beautiful things with my hands. I also love the challenge of coming up with new recipes.
It is. I love my job.
I'm glad to hear that. I hope you have a great day at work.
Thanks! I hope you have a great hike.
